verses.text: \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w*, \w especially|strong="H0853"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* all \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H0428"\w* Josue \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Sehon \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Amorrhites, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* manner \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*,

\w Do|strong="H0408"\w* manfully \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* good heart: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* ye dismayed \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* thy leader, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H1980"\w* thee \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Josue, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Take|strong="H2388"\w* \w courage|strong="H2388"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* valiant: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w divide|strong="H5157"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* lot.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* leader, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H1980"\w* thee, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thee: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w After|strong="H7093"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w remission|strong="H8059"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* tabernacles,

\w When|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* together, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, thou shalt \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w being|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w children|strong="H2945"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w learn|strong="H3925"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fulfill \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*:

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* ignorant, \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* lire \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* whither \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* going \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* nigh: \w call|strong="H7121"\w* Josue, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* ye \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w charge|strong="H6680"\w*. \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Josue \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, which \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* thou shalt \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w rising|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* fornicating \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* goeth \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* dwell: \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* void \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w*: \w all|strong="H3117"\w* evils \w and|strong="H0430"\w* afflictions \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w In|strong="H5921"\w* truth \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* evils \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w cover|strong="H5641"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evils \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* followed strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.
